# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = Vector{SubString{String}}(undef, 0)
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(str)
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        else
            append!(current_line, " ", word)
        end
    end
    if length(current_line) > 0
        push!(lines, current_line)
    end
    return join(lines, '\n')
end
```

Example usage:

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello World\nThis is a very long sentence that should be wrapped at the 10th character.")
"Hello World\nThis is a very long\nsentence that should be\nwrapped at the 10th\ncharacter."
```
